effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 538,691 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 225,682.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Plunderlord's Tricorne of Admiralty

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.4 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,103 Haste for 12 sec.
Valid only for tank specializations.

Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,251 and Haste by 8,382.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 326,178, and Intellect by 8,196.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
